html:
Value Added Tax Return

Company: {{ doc.company or 'Company Name' }}

Tax Period: {{ doc.tax_period or 'Tax Period' }}

Date From: {{ doc.date_from or 'Start Date' }} | Date To: {{ doc.date_to or 'End Date' }}

A. CALCULATION OF OUTPUT TAX AND IMPORTED SERVICES
Supply of Goods and/or Services by You
Description Amount Formula Total
Standard Rate (excluding capital goods and/or services and accommodation) (1) {{ doc.standard_rate_main_excl or 'R 0.00' }} × 15 / (100 + 15) (4) {{ doc.standard_rate_main_incl or 'R 0.00' }}
Standard Rate (only capital goods and/or services) (1A) {{ doc.standard_rate_capital_excl or 'R 0.00' }} × 15 / (100 + 15) (4A) {{ doc.stardard_rate_total or 'R 0.00' }}
Zero rate (excluding goods exported) (2) {{ doc.zero_rate_main_excl or 'R 0.00' }}
Zero rate (only exported) (2A) {{ doc.zero_rate_exported_excl or 'R 0.00' }}
Exempt and non-supplies (3) {{ doc.exempt_excl or 'R 0.00' }}
Supply of Accommodation
Description Amount Formula Total
Exceeding 28 Days (5) {{ doc.acc_exceed_28_days or 'R 0.00' }} × 60% (6) {{ doc.acc_exceed_28_days_total or 'R 0.00' }}
Value Not Exceeding 28 Days (7) {{ doc.acc_not_exceed_28_days or 'R 0.00' }}
Total (6 + 7) (8) {{ doc.acc_total_excl or 'R 0.00' }} × 15 / 100 (9) {{ doc.acc_total_incl or 'R 0.00' }}
Adjustments
Description Amount Formula Total
Change in use and export of second-hand goods (10) {{ doc.adj_change_in_use_excl or 'R 0.00' }} × 15 / (100 + 15) (11) {{ doc.adj_change_in_use_incl or 'R 0.00' }}
Other and Imported services (12) {{ doc.adj_other_incl or 'R 0.00' }}
Total Output Tax (4 + 4A + 9 + 11 + 12) (Total A) {{ doc.total_output_tax or 'R 0.00' }}
B. CALCULATION OF INPUT TAX
Description Amount Formula Total
Capital goods and/or services supplied to you (14) {{ doc.capital_goods_supplied or 'R 0.00' }}
Capital goods imported by you (14A) {{ doc.capital_goods_imported or 'R 0.00' }}
Other goods and/or services supplied to you (not capital goods) (15) {{ doc.other_goods_supplied or 'R 0.00' }}
Other goods imported by you (not capital goods) (15A) {{ doc.other_goods_imported or 'R 0.00' }}
Change in use (16) {{ doc.change_in_use or 'R 0.00' }}
Bad debts (17) {{ doc.bad_debts or 'R 0.00' }}
Other (18) {{ doc.other or 'R 0.00' }}
Total Input Tax (14 + 14A + 15 + 15A + 16 + 17 + 18) (Total B) {{ doc.total_input_tax or 'R 0.00' }}
Total VAT Payable/Refundable (Total A - Total B) (VAT Due) {{ doc.total_vat_payable_refundable or 'R 0.00' }}
name: VAT-Return Print format
